Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Marion Meyers
Reviews.Content: I wanted something cheap and that is what I got. It has been in for repairs often. I would have made a smarter deal by buying new for a little bit more. I would not buy a used computer again

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for travel, service and public access areas where losing it or damaging it would not break your heart or lose data
Reviews.Author: ChipGuy
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cheap, expendable Laptop for use on the road and on service calls. I use it primarily for web and email access and field service apps where everything is replaceable. I never store irreplaceable data on it and can use it from a Linux Live CD. It works well with the Tails Bootable CD version of Tor for use in public WiFi access areas and hotels. I downgraded it a star only on the basis of the battery which only has about a 1 hour life on it. I honestly didn't expect much from the battery on a refurb unit but I think they could screen them a bit better.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the purpose
Reviews.Author: Deborah Algren
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my daughter-in-law when her son had poured hot chocolate on her old laptop.The computer works fine.  It does not come with a camera which is also fine.I was unaware that it was a 2009 system and the video card is obsolete and crashes the system.For the price it is great for surfing and research.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: rebecca littleton
Reviews.Content: Was under impression that Microsoft Office was on computer but it was another version. Computer looks and runs New. Happy with perchance :-D
